title: Micron, Nike, BlackBerry, Braze: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Micron Technology beat analyst forecasts in quarterly results; BlackBerry earnings are due after the close
body:
U.S. stock futures rose, resuming the seesaw action that has become the signature of markets since the emergence of the Omicron Covid-19 variant. Here are the stocks we’re keeping tabs on before the bell:
Write to Joe Wallace at joe.wallace@wsj.com
